name: Beach Picnic
description: Relax and enjoy a picnic on the beach with beautiful views and a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Sunset Kayaking
description: Experience the beautiful sunset while kayaking through the Biscayne Bay.

name: Vizcaya Museum Gardens
description: Take a romantic stroll through the beautiful gardens of the Vizcaya Museum in Coconut Grove.

name: Wynwood Walls
description: Explore the vibrant street art scene in Wynwood, one of Miami's most artistic neighborhoods.

name: Miami Seaquarium
description: Spend the day learning about marine life and watching exciting animal shows.
